description.diamond-pearl:
The user bites with
electrified fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or become
paralyzed.

The user bites with
electrified fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or become
paralyzed.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
